img_meta.captions: A vintage scene featuring two horses pulling a carriage loaded with hay with several people sitting atop the load set against a backdrop of trees and open field.

entities.prompt: A wooden carriage loaded with hay, with multiple people seated atop the hay, being pulled by two horses.
The white horse in harness on one side of the carriage, standing in the foreground.
The darker horse on the other side of the carriage, also harnessed and pulling the load.

The white horse, positioned on one side of the carriage, is in the foreground. Its body and harness partially obscure the side of the wooden carriage it’s attached to, which remains in the background. The horse's overlapping area highlights the connection through its harness, emphasizing that it is pulling the carriage.

the darker horse on the opposite side is in the foreground. Its body and harness also overlap with the adjacent side of the carriage, partially covering it. This overlap indicates that the horse is actively engaged in pulling the carriage, with the carriage itself positioned in the background relative to the horse.
